mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ITEM (ITEMNO, CONSULTNO, TILING, TILINGD, FLOORING, FLOORINGD, KITCHEN, KITCHEND, BATHROOM, BATHROOMD, ENTRANCE, ENTRANCED, BALCONY, BALCONYD, LIGHTING, LIGHTINGD, DOOR, DOORD, ETC, ETCD) VALUES (#{itemNo}, #{consultNo}, #{tiling}, #{tilingD}, #{flooring}, #{flooringD}, #{kitchen}, #{kitchenD}, #{bathroom}, #{bathroomD}, #{entrance}, #{entranceD}, #{balcony}, #{balconyD}, #{lighting}, #{lightingD}, #{door}, #{doorD}, #{etc}, #{etcD})
